"Intensive Training at the Ruins!":
"You are late! I have been waiting,<%me>. If you
have come to this stage, you have to go to the
Ruins! It is unique within the planet Naberius.
Although only the D-Arkers has come out,
wouldn't it be perfect if we have intensive
training there? Let's go clear with S rank
at Very Hard difficulty level!

*Clear at S-Rank for Very Hard and above,
travelling with Azanami only."

"遅いよー！　わたし待ってたんだから。
さあ<%me>
ここまで来たら遺跡に行っとかなきゃ！
ナベリウスの中でも特異だし
ダーカーばっかり出て来るけど
特訓するにはうってつけでしょ？
ベリーハードで気持ちよくＳランク
クリアしてスッキリしようよ！
※アザナミのみ同行、ブレイバー限定
ベリーハード以上、Ｓランククリア"
